DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot trial of centrifugal machine preservation of donor livers for transplantation using a novel preservation solution.
DOC.brief_title: Vasosol Organ Perfusion Solution and Medtronic Portable Bypass System
DOC.criteria: Primary/ Solitary Liver Transplant Lab MELD<35 Donor age <65 Donor Liver > 30% Macrosteatosis DCD donor liver Multiorgan Recipient Recipient in ICU Retransplant
